TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ItemAutomationPeer extends System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer implements class System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider
Public MustInherit Class ItemAutomationPeer Inherits AutomationPeer Implements IVirtualizedItemProvider
type ItemAutomationPeer = class inherit AutomationPeer interface IVirtualizedItemProvider

summary.span: 将 集合中的数据项公开到 UI 自动化。

span.span: Exposes a data item in an collection to UI Automation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还不是类型的数据项不具有子级; 但是, 它们可以有一个树和一个对应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的树。Data items that are not also types do not have children; however, they can have a tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 例如, 可以具有包含数据项的字符串的集合。For example, a can have a collection of strings that contain data items. 当这些项由进行可视化处理时, 将为其创建一个树。When those items are processed by an for visualization, a tree is created for them. 此树可以有对应[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的树。This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 创建树后, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]将树合并到[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树中。After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree. 与其对应项 (如果存在) 一起使用, 以获取有关树的详细信息。 works with its counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the tree. 只有可见数据项 (更准确地说是对应的树) 具有此 dualism。Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding trees, have this dualism. 不可见的数据项 (没有对应的树) 只有一个。 Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding trees, have only one .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以将 "名称" 属性视为文本字符串, 用户可以使用它来解释所引用的控件。You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to. 请确保中的[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)]所有控件都有文本表示形式, 以便能够以编程方式引用控件。Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner. 此方法由 调用。This method is called by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`patternInterface` `this`为 , 并且项不在可视化树中, 则此方法返回指针。If `patternInterface` is and the item is not in the visual tree, this method returns a `this` pointer. 如果`patternInterface` 等于, 则此方法返回实现接口的对象。If `patternInterface` equals , this method returns an object that implements the interface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider.Realize() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使虚拟项像 UI 自动化元素一样可完全访问。

span.span: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface.
